title: Effective Communication in the Workplace
story: Mario called. He wants you to call back before 7 p.m. Sales meeting this afternoon at 12 noon. Meeting Room 2. Pens ready for collection between 10 a.m. and 3 p.m. Jackie is leaving the office at 4 p.m. today. Please remember to lock the doors. The keys are in your drawer.
summary: Learn how to enhance communication in the workplace and ensure efficient collaboration among team members.
image: An image of a team discussing a project in a meeting room.
